Uses of Class
com.riskybusiness.neural.InvalidNeuronInputException

  • Packages that use InvalidNeuronInputException 
    Package Description
    com.riskybusiness.neural
         This package desribes all of the necessary objects it takes to make an artificially intelligent neural network.

    • Uses of InvalidNeuronInputException in com.riskybusiness.neural

      Methods in com.riskybusiness.neural that throw InvalidNeuronInputException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Neuron.addToInput(int index, float output)
      Adds a given output (presumably from another Neuron) to the Neuron.inputs list.
      void Neuron.adjustWeight(int index, float adjustment)
      Adjust the wieght given the learning rate and the weight index of this Neuron.
      void Neuron.adjustWeights(float... adjustments)
      Adjusts the weights given the learning rate and weights of this Neuron as well as the adjustments needed for every weight.
      void Synapse.feedForward()
      Feeds the output from the sending Neuron to the input of the receiving Neuron.
      void Synapse.feedForward(float... inputs)
      This method should be called when the sending Neuron has no synapses to it, and send the inputs to the sending Neuron to fire.
      float[] NeuralNet.fire(float[][] inputs)
      Populates the NeuralNet with the inputs and calculates their corresponding output.
      protected float Neuron.sum(float... inputs)
      Sums the list of inputs given.
      void Neuron.train(float desired, float... inputs)
      Trains the Neuron in the traditional sense.
